name: The Maelstrom's Tendril
tooltip:
The Maelstrom's TendrilLevel 60

Even from here I can hear the sound of your volleys laying waste to our enemies. Their cries echo in agony.

You have made quite a name for yourself among the trolls of Zandalar, <name>. We are grateful for all that you have done.

Hand me your talisman so that I may add another weave.

Requirements:
- Maelstrom's Tendril
